txt.en: Each platform must be occupied before Gortheron calls forth Frothmar
The source of the poisoned waters has several places of safety. Taunt the evil there by always having each location be occupied by a hero of the Free Peoples.
Deep beyond the diseased infestation lies the source of the poison waters. Once you find it, make sure each safe location is occupied by a hero of the Free Peoples.
Continue to occupy and defend each safe location with a hero of the Free Peoples. All safe locations must survive the battle.
Continue to occupy and defend each safe location with a hero of the Free Peoples. All safe locations must survive the battle.
Reach the source of the poisoned waters
All platforms must survive the battle
All safe locations must survive the battle
